scripts.start_backend: cd Mongo_Operations/ && npm install && npm test && cd ../To_Do_Curd_API  && npm install && npm test  && kill -9 $(lsof -t -i:4000) && npm run withoutdebug
scripts.start_frontend: cd angular6-frontend/ && npm install && kill -9 $(lsof -t -i:4200) && ng serve --port=4200 -o
scripts.After_Some_Change_debug: cd Mongo_Operations/ && npm install && cd ../MVC_Pattern_API/To_Do_List/ && npm install && npm  start
scripts.After_Some_Change: cd Mongo_Operations/ && npm install && cd ../MVC_Pattern_API/To_Do_List/ && npm install && npm run withoutdebug
